sections.name: Overview
sections.contents: For my capstone project, I worked with two other students to create a suite of procedural terrain and city generation algorithms as a plugin for Unity. Algorithms were evaluated using feedback gathered through Amazon Mechanical Turk.

sections.name: Features
sections.contents:
• 4 Lesson Modules
  • Adaptive Challenges and Hints
  • Virtual Assistant/Narrator
  • Cooperative and Competitive Play Modes
